As I understand it, the Logjam TLS attack is an attack that downgrades the DHE cipher suite used by the server to DHE_EXPORT. Where the client thinks it is talking DHE 512 and the server things it's talking DHE_EXPORT (which is 512 but with a different name?).It is not possible to downgrade to a lower (weaker) bit DHE ciphers: it is just a cipher downgrade.
